I've been seeing a lot of these adventure things so I decided to make one of my own...EDIT: all the other rules ive made so far have been placed here as well.

Rules
-Everyone should create their own character to do this with
-To do an attack flip a coin (tails is a hit) then roll (depends on weapon) for Damage
-Everyone starts with an inventory space of seven
-depending on the enemy they'll have more or less life eg.
...ant: whereas..soldier(armored):
-Since the popularity has risen this much...i'll be adding in some revives...to do this you'll have to have to have an ally fight a gauntlet of ten enemies...each with varying life amounts over eight.
-For each point of life an enemy has you gain 5XP

Might as well write down your info and story on a word page as not to forget stuff.



Scavenging Rolls (Basic, non event)
-1: 3 spheres of glass
-2: (*Same as 17*)
-3-7: Nothing
-8: 25 gold coins
-9: (*Same as 17*)
-10: A new weapon (roll 1-4) Gun, Sword, Stick, Stave
-11: (*Same as 17*)
-12: You lose 3HP from a bear trap
-13: A diamond (sells for 250 gold coins)
-14: You lose 2 life from a large fall
-15: (*Same as 17*)
-16: You meet up with a magic scroll (abilty: Quick Time; Always go first in a battle
-17:Enemy: (roll 1-4) Spider 4HP, Bandit 7, Kobold Sentinal 5,Light Gunner 4.5
-18: You find a runic enchantment (+ 1 to any weapon)
-19-20: You discover a maximum life canister (+1 to max life)




Human 5 HP 5 MP engineer class

Elven 4 HP 7 MP Ranger Class

Kobold 7 HP 3 MP Builder Class

Nodachi 6 HP 4 MP Assassin Class

Lycan 8 HP 2 MP Shapeshifter Class

Dwarven 7 HP 5 MP Smith Class


You gain 1HP and 1MP each level
You must also roll for race picks




Basic UI Setup

On march 8, 2014
[821509]

Rules
-Everyone should create their own character to do this with
-To do an attack flip a coin (tails is a hit)
-Once dead there is no way to come back
-Everyone starts with an inventory space of seven
-Use mostly mush symbols for status effects
-depending on the enemy they'll have more or less life eg.
...ant: whereas..soldier(armored):
-Since the popularity has risen this much...i'll be adding in some revives...to do this you'll have to have to have an ally fight a gauntlet of ten enemies...each with varying life amounts over eight.
-Now when attacking you have to throw a head or tails for the enemy as a re-attack(can't remember word) rate (tails as usual).

Might as well write down your info and story on a word page as not to forget stuff.

Edit: depending on what stuff you have it modifies your inventory size

2 pockets only: 3 slots
1 backpack: 5 slots
both: 7 slots
both plus 1 satchel: 10 slots
all 3 plus utilty belt: 12 slots

MadDonut declares himself a Cleric under the god of The Almighty Pastry (himself)! +1 when healing to himself or others!

MadDonut rides his Vagrant to the nearest tavern. It is a space bar called Jumpin' Jives. After tying his Vagrant outside, MadDonut enters the bar and purchases a Jar of Space Mush (-5 coins) and requests a grand quest!

The barkeeper looks at him strangely, then offers to pay him if he gets rid of a Bloody Lumpy Garbage Bag. The barkeeper offers him 50 coins upon completion..

MadDonut accepts immediately without hesitation!

MadDonut takes the bag and heads outside. He feds his Vagrant half of the Jar of Space Mush before hopping onto his shoulders again. MadDonut rides off to find somewhere to dispose of the Bloody Lumpy Garbage Bag!

[821509]

its like a spear with the spear point on one end and a dagger axe on the other (a dagger axe is the axe with the spike on the top and the sharp part opposite the axe part)*not the doube axe*
On march 9, 2014
Afterwind11

Wikipedia:A halberd (also called halbard, halbert or Swiss voulge) is a two-handed pole weapon that came to prominent use during the 14th and 15th centuries. The word halberd may come from the German words Halm (staff), and Barte (axe). In modern-day German, the weapon is called a Hellebarde. The halberd consists of an axe blade topped with a spike mounted on a long shaft. It always has a hook or thorn on the back side of the axe blade for grappling mounted combatants.[1] It is very similar to certain forms of the voulge in design and usage. The halberd was 1.5 to 1.8 metres (5 to 6 feet) long.[2]

Please follow the few basic rules.
1. You start with only a pocket penknife (1 )
2. You should roll your race instead of choosing it
3. You start with 10
4. You need 100 to level up to level 2
5. (recommended) follow the format of the character sheet.
On march 19, 2014
45424

By the way there's still 1 orb that can be obtained.

Yellow orb (electric): +50% spell damage -20% attack damage
On level up: +0.8HP +1MP
All damaging spells will be imbued with the lightning element.

Blue orb (water): -30% attack damage
On level up: +1HP +1.5MP
All damaging spells will be imbued with the water element.

Red orb (fire): +50% attack damage
On level up: +0.5HP +1MP
All attacks will be imbued with the fire element.

Green orb (wood): +1 from all healing effects
On level up: +1.5HP +0.5MP
All attacks will be imbued with the wood element.

Electric > Water > Fire > Wood > Electric
+50% damage to the element you're strong against; -50% damage to the element you're weak against.

Non-elemental takes 100% damage from all elements.
